description: This template deploys Cloudera Director, a MySQL server, and a BIND DNS server on a single VM.
summary: This template deploys Cloudera Director with DB server, DNS server on a single VM. Cloudera Director is the fastest, easiest way to manage the lifecycle of enterprise Apache Hadoop clusters on Azure. The Director VM includes a template for deploying CDH and Cloudera Manager, enabling you to run high-value big data workloads on Azure.
